verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech So king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh, Solomon מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech was king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. over all Israel ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> has-sa-Rim And these [were] the princes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֑וֹ lo; עֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <WH5838> 'a-zar-Ya-hu which he had Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok of Zadok הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen. the priest ס sa-Mek

אֱלִיחֹ֧רֶף <WH456> 'e-li-Cho-ref Elihoreph וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <WH281> va-'a-chi-Yah and Ahiah בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons שִׁישָׁ֖א <WH7894> shi-Sha of Shisha סֹפְרִ֑ים <WH5608> so-fe-Rim; scribes יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> ye-ho-sha-Fat Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <WH286> 'a-chi-Lud of Ahilud הַמַּזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> ham-maz-Kir. the recorder

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <WH1141> u-ve-na-Ya-hu And Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יְהוֹיָדָ֖ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' of Jehoiada עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> hatz-tza-Va; [was] over the host וְצָד֥וֹק <WH6659> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok וְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <WH54> ve-'ev-ya-Tar and Abiathar כֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> ko-ha-Nim. [were] the priests ס sa-Mek

וַעֲזַרְיָ֥הוּ <WH5838> va-'a-zar-Ya-hu And Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> na-Tan of Nathan עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַנִּצָּבִ֑ים <WH5324> han-nitz-tza-Vim; [was] over the officers וְזָב֧וּד <WH2071> ve-za-Vud and Zabud בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נָתָ֛ן <WH5416> na-Tan of Nathan כֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> ko-Hen [was] principal officer רֵעֶ֥ה <WH7463> re-'Eh friend הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. [and] the king's

וַאֲחִישָׁ֖ר <WH301> va-'a-chi-Shar And Ahishar עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- was over הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; [was] over the household וַאֲדֹנִירָ֥ם <WH141> va-'a-do-ni-Ram and Adoniram בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עַבְדָּ֖א <WH5653> 'av-Da of Abda עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over הַמַּֽס׃ <WH4522> ham-Mas. [was] over the tribute ס sa-Mek

וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֞ה <WH8010> ve-lish-lo-Moh And Solomon שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> she-neim- both עָשָׂ֤ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten נִצָּבִים֙ <WH5324> nitz-tza-Vim officers עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, over all Israel וְכִלְכְּל֥וּ <WH3557> ve-chil-ke-Lu which provided victuals אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech for the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> bei-To; and his household חֹ֧דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh his month בַּשָּׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah in a year יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over; אֶחָד 'e-chad כהָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> ha-'e-Chad a קלְכַלְכֵּֽל׃ <WH3557> le-chal-Kel. made provision ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמוֹתָ֔ם <WH8034> she-mo-Tam, And these [are] their names בֶּן־ ben- ח֖וּר <WH1133> chur The son of Hur בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim. Ephraim ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- דֶּ֛קֶר <WH1128> De-ker Ben-deker בְּמָקַ֥ץ <WH4739> be-ma-Katz in Makaz וּבְשַֽׁעַלְבִ֖ים <WH8169> u-ve-sha-'al-Vim and in Shaalbim וּבֵ֣ית u-Veit שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH1053> Sha-mesh; and Bethshemesh וְאֵיל֖וֹן ve-'ei-Lon בֵּ֥ית beit חָנָֽן׃ <WH358> cha-Nan. and Elonbethhanan ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- חֶ֖סֶד <WH1136> Che-sed Ben-hesed בָּֽאֲרֻבּ֑וֹת <WH700> ba-'a-rub-Bot; in Aruboth ל֥וֹ lo שֹׂכֹ֖ה <WH7755> so-Choh to him [pertained] Sochoh וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz and all the land חֵֽפֶר׃ <WH2660> Che-fer. of Hepher ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <WH1125> 'a-vi-na-Dav The son of Abinadab כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all נָ֣פַת <WH5299> Na-fat in all the region דֹּ֑אר <WH1756> Dor; of Dor טָפַת֙ <WH2955> ta-Fat which had Taphath בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh, of Solomon הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> Ha-ye-tah become לּ֖וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife ס sa-Mek

בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <WH1195> ba-'a-Na Baana בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲחִיל֔וּד <WH286> 'a-chi-Lud, of Ahilud תַּעְנַ֖ךְ <WH8590> ta'-Nach [to him pertained] Taanach וּמְגִדּ֑וֹ <WH4023> u-me-gid-Do; and Megiddo וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all בֵּ֣ית beit שְׁאָ֡ן <WH1052> she-'An and all Bethshean אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֵ֨צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel which [is] by צָרְתַ֜נָה <WH6891> tza-re-Ta-nah Zartanah מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> mit-Ta-chat Thahash לְיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> le-yiz-re-'El, beneath Jezreel מִבֵּ֤ית mib-Beit שְׁאָן֙ <WH1052> she-'An from Bethshean עַ֚ד <WH5704> 'ad far אָבֵ֣ל 'a-Vel מְחוֹלָ֔ה <WH65> me-cho-Lah, to Abelmeholah עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far מֵעֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver [even] unto [the place that is] beyond לְיָקְמֳעָֽם׃ <WH3361> le-ya-ke-mo-'Am. Jokneam ס sa-Mek

בֶּן־ ben- גֶּ֖בֶר <WH1127> Ge-ver The son of Geber בְּרָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> be-ra-Mot Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad; which [are] in Gilead ל֡וֹ lo חַוֹּת֩ <WH2333> chav-Vot to him [pertained] the towns יָאִ֨יר <WH2971> ya-'Ir of Jair בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּגִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> bag-gil-'Ad, Gilead ל֚וֹ lo חֶ֤בֶל <WH2256> Che-vel to him [also pertained] the region אַרְגֹּב֙ <WH709> ar-Go of Argob אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> bab-ba-Shan, which [is] in Bashan שִׁשִּׁים֙ <WH8346> shish-Shim threescore עָרִ֣ים <WH5892> 'a-Rim cities גְּדֹל֔וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot, great חוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> cho-Mah with walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <WH1280> u-ve-Ri-ach bars נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet. and brasen ס sa-Mek
אֲחִֽינָדָ֥ב <WH292> 'a-chi-na-Dav Ahinadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עִדֹּ֖א <WH5714> 'id-Do of Iddo מַחֲנָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4266> ma-cha-Na-ye-mah. [had] Mahanaim

אֲחִימַ֖עַץ <WH290> 'a-chi-Ma-'atz Ahimaaz בְּנַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> be-naf-ta-Li; [was] in Naphtali גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also ה֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he לָקַ֛ח <WH3947> la-Kach he also took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <WH1315> ba-se-Mat Basmath בַּת־ <WH1323> bat- the daughter שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh of Solomon לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

בַּֽעֲנָא֙ <WH1195> ba-'a-Na Baanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חוּשָׁ֔י <WH2365> chu-Shai, of Hushai בְּאָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> be-'a-Sher [was] in Asher וּבְעָלֽוֹת׃ <WH1175> u-ve-'a-Lot. and in Aloth ס sa-Mek
יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> ye-ho-sha-Fat Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פָּר֖וּחַ <WH6515> pa-Ru-ach of Paruah בְּיִשָׂשכָֽר׃ <WH3485> be-yi-so-sh-Char. in Issachar ס sa-Mek
שִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> shim-'I Shimei בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son אֵלָ֖א <WH414> 'e-La of Elah בְּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> be-vin-ya-Min. in Benjamin ס sa-Mek

גֶּ֥בֶר <WH1398> Ge-ver Geber בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֻרִ֖י <WH221> 'u-Ri of Uri בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz [was] in the country גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad; of Gilead אֶ֜רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz [in] the country סִיח֣וֹן׀ <WH5511> si-Chon of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites וְעֹג֙ <WH5747> ve-'Og and of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan וּנְצִ֥יב <WH5333> u-ne-Tziv officer אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and [he was] the only אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. which [was] in the land

יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, [were] many כַּח֥וֹל <WH2344> ka-Chol as the sand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- that עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is on הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam which [is] by the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> la-Ro; in multitude אֹכְלִ֥ים <WH398> 'o-che-Lim eating וְשֹׁתִ֖ים <WH8354> ve-sho-Tim and drinking וּשְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <WH8056> u-se-me-Chim. and making merry

וּשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> u-she-lo-Moh, And Solomon הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become מוֹשֵׁל֙ <WH4910> mo-Shel reigned בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> ham-mam-la-Chot, over all kingdoms מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> han-na-Har from the river אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz unto the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad and to גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul and unto the border מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <WH5066> mag-gi-Shim they brought מִנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> min-Chah presents וְעֹבְדִ֥ים <WH5647> ve-'oe-Dim and served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh Solomon כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> ye-Mei all the days חַיָּֽיו׃ <WH2416> chai-Yav. of his life פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi become לֶֽחֶם־ <WH3899> le-chem- provision שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh And Solomon's לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> le-Yom day אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> 'e-Chad; for one שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim was thirty כֹּר֙ <WH3734> kor measures סֹ֔לֶת <WH5560> So-let, of fine flour וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim and threescore כֹּ֖ר <WH3734> kor measures קָֽמַח׃ <WH7058> Ka-mach. of meal

עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah Ten בָקָ֜ר <WH1241> va-Kar oxen בְּרִאִ֗ים <WH1277> be-ri-'Im, fat וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> ba-Kar oxen רְעִ֖י <WH7471> re-'I out of the pastures וּמֵ֣אָה <WH3967> u-Me-'ah and an hundred צֹ֑אן <WH6629> Tzon; sheep לְ֠בַד <WH905> Le-vad alone מֵֽאַיָּ֤ל <WH354> me-'ai-Yal beside harts וּצְבִי֙ <WH6643> u-tze-Vi and roebucks וְיַחְמ֔וּר <WH3180> ve-yach-Mur, and fallowdeer וּבַרְבֻּרִ֖ים <WH1257> u-var-bu-Rim fowl אֲבוּסִֽים׃ <WH75> 'a-vu-Sim. and fatted

כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ה֞וּא <WH1931> hu he רֹדֶ֣ה׀ <WH7287> ro-Deh For he had dominion בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol everything עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> 'E-ver over all [the region] on this side הַנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> han-na-Har, the river מִתִּפְסַח֙ <WH8607> mit-tif-Sach from Tiphsah וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- even עַזָּ֔ה <WH5804> 'az-Zah, even to Azzah בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all מַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> mal-Chei over all the kings עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> 'E-ver on this side הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> han-na-Har; the river וְשָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> ve-sha-Lom, and he had peace הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah had ל֛וֹ lo מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all עֲבָרָ֖יו <WH5676> 'a-va-Rav sides מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv. round about

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <WH3427> vai-ye-Shev dwelt יְהוּדָ֨ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah And Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel לָבֶ֗טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach, safely אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under גַּפְנוֹ֙ <WH1612> gaf-No under his vine וְתַ֣חַת <WH8478> ve-Ta-chat under תְּאֵֽנָת֔וֹ <WH8384> te-'e-na-To, and under his fig tree מִדָּ֖ן <WH1835> mid-Dan from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against בְּאֵ֣ר be-'Er שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> Sha-va'; even to Beersheba כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> ye-Mei all the days שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> she-lo-Moh. of Solomon ס sa-Mek
